content: The Snow Fox Questline in Chapter 3 will see you track down a monk who has wronged a fox guai. Transform into a fox and confront the monk at New Thunderclap Temple to face Non-Void.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 3', specifically from the subsection 'Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
The Snow Fox Questline in Chapter 3 will see you track down a monk who has wronged a fox guai. Transform into a fox and confront the monk at New Thunderclap Temple to face Non-Void.
